channel.title: Quantum Error Correcting Code on Think. Learn. Repeat.
channel.description: Recent content in Quantum Error Correcting Code on Think. Learn. Repeat.

item.title: The [[5,1,3]] Stabilizer Code
item.description: Quantum computers built with physical qubits are susceptible to propagation of error due to either decoherence, thermal, or other quantum noise thereby lowering the trust in the computational output.
